1.title: Jonah Flees
1.keyEvent: Jonah attempts to flee God's command to Nineveh

2.title: Prayer from the Fish
2.keyEvent: Jonah prays to God from inside the great fish

3.title: Nineveh Repents
3.keyEvent: Jonah preaches; Nineveh repents and is spared

4.title: Jonah's Displeasure
4.keyEvent: Jonah is angry over God's mercy to Nineveh
